column2: I HAVE to go here for ramen!  The first time my husband and I went here
column3: it was for our anniversary. In fact
column4: we drove all the way from Austin to dine here because we heard so many great things about it on Yelp!  Ok
column5: so it wasn't the only reason why went went to Houston (my hometown)
column6: but it was a priority.  I ordered the Soy Spicy Ramen - interesting combination of ground pork with hints of spicy and creamy. I enjoyed it!  In fact
column7: we loved our experience so much
column9: we went again for our anniversary and had a feast of ramen with dumplings
column11: and seared scallops. After we ate every bite
column12: we slowly walked after we had glutonized ourselves.
